title: Meta-Domain Adaptive Framework for Efficient Diagnostic Assessment of Lung Infection Using CT Radiographs
details: M Owais, T Hassan, N Afzal, SH Khan, D Velayudhan… - 2024
abstract: Computed tomography (CT) scans are widely used for diagnosing lung infections, but manual interpretation is laborious. Artificial intelligence has spurred the development of efficient computer-aided diagnostic (CAD) systems, promising faster …
